dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A fire in a residential building, you'd think the alarms would go off, but in this case, residents in Astana had to evacuate on their own.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A fire in a residential building, you'd think the alarms would go off, but in this case, residents in Astana had to evacuate on their own.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents evacuated the building on their own.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's right, it was at a complex on Tauelsizdik Street, in the Sarayshyk district. The Ministry of Emergency Situations said it started in a cable shaft between the 5th and 12th floors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's right, it was at a complex on Tauelsizdik Street, in the Sarayshyk district. The Ministry of Emergency Situations said it started in a cable shaft between the fifth and twelfth floors.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Firefighters are currently battling the blaze at the complex located on Tauelsizdik Street in the Sarayshyk district of the city. "Preliminary reports indicate the fire started in a cable shaft between the 5th and 12th floors," the Ministry of Emergency Situations said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's uh, that's a pretty significant vertical spread for a fire to start like that. And no injuries reported so far, which is honestly amazing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's uh, that's a pretty significant vertical spread for a fire to start like that. And no injuries reported so far, which is honestly amazing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: No injuries have been reported so far.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It is, especially since people had to get themselves out. Fire crews are there now under an elevated response level, so they're taking it very seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is, especially since people had to get themselves out. Fire crews are there now under an elevated response level, so they're taking it very seriously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Fire crews are working at the scene under an elevated response level.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it makes me think about how quickly these things can escalate. Just earlier this month, on June 2nd, there was that grass fire in the Atbasar district.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it makes me think about how quickly these things can escalate. Just earlier this month, on June second, there was that grass fire in the Atbasar district.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, on June 2, a grass fire occurred in the Atbasar district of the Akmola region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, in the Akmola region. Different type of fire, but still, it feels like emergency services have been busy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, in the Akmola region. Different type of fire, but still, it feels like emergency services have been busy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, on June 2, a grass fire occurred in the Atbasar district of the Akmola region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And with residents self-evacuating here, it raises questions about, like, building safety protocols, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And with residents self-evacuating here, it raises questions about, like, building safety protocols, doesn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. You hope systems are in place, but when a fire starts in a utility space like a cable shaft, it can bypass a lot of standard detection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. You hope systems are in place, but when a fire starts in a utility space like a cable shaft, it can bypass a lot of standard detection.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Let's just hope they contain it quickly and everyone stays safe.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Let's just hope they contain it quickly and everyone stays safe.
